{
        "Summary": "- BrucePac provides customized packaging solutions for all protein products packaged by the food industry.\n- They offer various Portion Pack Film Packaging including pillow bags, gusset bags, vacuum pouches, and vacuum pouch saddle packs.\n- Vertical and Horizontal Form-fill-sealing offers ideal packaging for various sizes of proteins and marinades.\n- BrucePac provides retail-ready packaging with a variety of presenting options.",

        "Email": "binfo@brucepac.com",
        "Phone Number": "800.899.3629",
        "Address": "380 S Pacific Hwy, 99EWoodburn, Oregon 97071",
        "Product Information": "- Pillow Bag\n- Gusseted Bag\n- Vacuum Pouch\n- Vacuum Pouch Saddle Pack\n- Vertical Form-fill-seal\n- Horizontal Form-fill-seal",
        "Representative": "None",
        "Useful Information": "- All film is BPA-Free and can be pre-printed.\n- Production Facilities in Woodburn, OR and Durant, OK."
}

search_result.link_content_summary:
{
 "Summary": "- This HTML primarily focuses on BrucePac's capabilities and custom culinary expertise in providing various protein-based products.
- BrucePac offers a wide range of product options to meet specific protein needs, including bulk ingredients, private labels, portion pouches, foodservice packs, and customized packaging.
- The company's brands cater to different market segments, offering all-natural, antibiotic-free, and organic protein solutions.
- Customer testimonials highlight the company's commitment to quality, clear communication, and attention to detail.
- BrucePac's in-house R&D capabilities allow for easy customization of proteins for various meal designs and nutritional formats.",

 "Email": "binfo@brucepac.com",

 "Address": "380 S Pacific Hwy, 99E
Woodburn, Oregon 97071",

"Summary": "Summarizing the contents of the HTML source code, with regard to the company BrucePac, proves to be difficult as the page is primarily a landing page for their products; however, I was able to successfully extract available information from the source code.

1. BrucePac is a company that offers a variety of cooked proteins including chicken, beef, pork, turkey, and plant-based proteins.
2. Their contact information is as follows:
    - Email: binfo@brucepac.com
    - Phone: 1-(800)899-3629
3. Their headquarters is located at 380 S Pacific Hwy, 99E Woodburn, Oregon 97071.
4. They have production facilities in both Woodburn, Oregon and Durant, Oklahoma.",
